channel.title: 软件性能 on Hugo Theme Tailwind Example Site
channel.description: Recent content in 软件性能 on Hugo Theme Tailwind Example Site

item.title: 软件性能描述维度
item.description: English Term English Explanation 中文名称 中文解释 Response Time The time taken for the system to respond to a request. 响应时间 系统接收到请求后，到返回响应所需要的时间。 Throughput The number of requests processed by the system per unit time. 吞吐量 系统在单位时间内处理的请求数量。 Concurrent Users The number of users simultaneously making requests to the system. 并发用户数 同时向系统发出请求的用户数量。 Load The amount of work given to the system over a period. 负载 在一定时间内施加给系统的工作量。 Latency The time taken for data to travel from one point to another.
